scene_description_enriched: A crowned figure, likely a king or saint, stands within a decorative architectural frame. The figure wears a blue robe and a white sash draped over their shoulder. Their right hand holds a small object, possibly a relic or a symbol of office, while their left hand is extended outwards. The background is a textured gold leaf, suggesting a divine or sacred context. The architectural surround features pointed arches and decorative elements, indicative of Gothic style.
